manpage.title: _tell, _telli64

return.para: Return value is the offset of current file pointer position relative to the beginning of file. If function returns -1L it means error and errno is set to EBADF; EBADF means parameter is not a valid file descriptor. Devices that don't allow search (ex. printer) returns not defined value.

remarks.para: _tell function gets the current position of handle parameter associated file pointer and returns offset of current positon relative to the beginning of the file. The return value of _telli64 function is 64-bit integer.
